mapper.select: SELECT product.id AS product_id, product.description, promotion.id AS id, category.id AS category_id, category.name AS category_name, pimg.id AS product_image_id FROM promotion, product, category, product_image pimg WHERE promotion.product_id = product.id AND product.category_id = category.id AND product.id = pimg.product_id AND pimg.type = 'ma'
